verses.roman:
pūrve dui nāṭaka chila ekatra racanā
dui-bhāga kari ebe karimu ghaṭanā

synonyms: pūrve—previously; dui nāṭaka—two dramas; chila—there was; ekatra—together; racanā—composition; dui-bhāga kari—dividing into two; ebe—now; karimu ghaṭanā—I shall write the incidents.
translation: FormerIy I wrote the two dramas as one composition. Now I shall divide it and describe the incidents in two separate works.
